text: Since the tourism in Dubrovnik is present for almost 100 years , in town we have different kinds of accommodation , from hotels,auto camps to the private accommodation. Villa Gloria is that kind of private acccommodation wich has almost 50 years of tradition of offering service. Her offer is made of two apartments, three studio apartments and two rooms. Location of Villa is only 150 m distance from Old town and 70 m from the most popular beach of Dubrovnik called "Banje", supermarket and taxi station is 50 m away. Also distance from airport is 18 km, from bus terminal is 4,5 km and from ferry is 3 km. We shour hope that you will come to visit us and make shour that we are very good hosts. Dubrovnik has been a tourist destination for almost 100 years and thus offers a variety of accommodation options, from hotels and campsites to private accommodation. Villa Gloria is a kind of private accommodation with 50-year-old tradition. It has two apartments, three studio apartments and two rooms. The Villa is situated only 150 m away from the Old Town Dubrovnik and 70 m from the most popular beach called "Banje". A supermarket and taxi stand are 50 m away. It is located 18 km from the airport, 4.5 km from the bus station and 3 km from the ferry terminal. We hope you will visit us soon and enjoy our hospitality
trans: 두브로브니크 관광은 약 100년의 역사를 가지고 있으며, 이 도시는 다양한 숙박 옵션을 제공하고 있으며, 호텔과 오토 캠핑장부터 개인 숙박 시설까지 다양한 형태가 있습니다. 빌라 글로리아는 50년 전통을 가진 개인 숙박 시설로, 두 개의 아파트, 세 개의 스튜디오와 두 개의 객실을 보유하고 있습니다. 이 빌라는 두브로브니크 올드 타운에서 150m 떨어져 있고, 가장 인기 있는 해변인 "반예" 해변에서 70m 거리에 위치하고 있습니다. 또한, 슈퍼마켓과 택시 정류장까지 50m, 공항까지 18km, 버스 터미널까지 4.5km, 페리 터미널까지 3km의 거리에 위치하고 있습니다. 저희를 방문하셔서, 따뜻한 환대를 직접 경험해 보시길 바랍니다.
